reviewText: Based on an earlier purchase from the same company, I went ahead and laid out for this video. I'm pleased to say it wasn't wasted money. This stuff is dynamite and beats the s**t out of what passes as karate today - these guys are out for blood. My only gripe is that some of the clips are a little too fast, but that's a small moan. I've watched it so many times now, I don't have to worry about missing the technique.
